sentences.en: At equilibrium the resultant of all external forces vanish.
sentences.cn: 在平衡时,所有外力的合力为零.

sentences.en: At least a quarter of a million people have died in the fighting and the resultant famines.
sentences.cn: 至少25万人死于这场战斗和由此引发的饥荒。

sentences.en: She is still trying to get over the attack and the resultant injuries.
sentences.cn: 她仍在努力从袭击以及由此造成的伤害中恢复过来。

sentences.en: The definition implies two resultant temperatures, transitory and steady state.
sentences.cn: 该定义包括有瞬时的和稳态的两种合成温度.

sentences.en: the growing economic crisis and resultant unemployment
sentences.cn: 不断加剧的经济危机以及由此而产生的失业

sentences.en: The resultant defect is known as chromatic aberration.
sentences.cn: 由此而产生的缺陷叫做色差.

sentences.en: The resultant effect on flash temperature is not immediately apparent.
sentences.cn: 这些情况对瞬现温度的综合影响是不能直接看出的.

sentences.en: The resultant grains tend also to be elongated along the direction of deformation.
sentences.cn: 所形成的晶粒沿变形方向被拉长.

sentences.en: The resultant hydrolytic reaction product is dihydrochloride.
sentences.cn: 所形成的水解反应物是二盐酸.

sentences.en: The resultant hydrolytic reaction product is methylenedioxyamine dihydrochloride.
sentences.cn: 所形成的水解反应物是二盐酸甲撑二氧胺.

sentences.en: The resultant image was assessed using a Quantimet image analyser.
sentences.cn: 所产生的图像由一台定量电视显微镜的图像分析器来加以分析.

sentences.en: The resultant material was to be pored over by experts in psychology.
sentences.cn: 这样的一份材料要由心理学专家精心研究.

sentences.en: The two stresses can then be added algebraically to obtain the resultant.
sentences.cn: 然后将两种应力代数相加就得到合应力.

sentences.en: The viscous drags is equal to the resultant force.
These quantities are called stress resultant.
This determinant is a special case of the resultant of two polynomials.
sentences.cn: 这个行列式是两个行列式的结式的特殊情形.

words.tran_cn: 结果；成绩；答案；比赛结果

trans.tran_cn: 因而发生的，结果必然产生的，[物]组合的，合成的
trans.tran_en: happening or existing because of something
